title: Prince of Stride â€“ Up the Wind and Drive Your Emotions - Novel Updates
author: Naruki Nagakawa   Shuji Sogabe   Yo Asahi
description: Stride is a fictitious extreme sport combining parkour and long-distance relay racing. Stride teams consists of 6 main members - 1 relationer and 5 runners. The story follows first year student Nana Sakurai and the Honan Academy stride team as they take on the EOS (End of Summer) Stride tournament against their opponents.>
